languages.text: "Похищение солнц? {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g} способны и не на такое, мон-кай — Комморра купается в лучах трех светил, украденных моими сородичами. Но если ты думаешь, что я приложил руку к этому, или иному воровству звезд — напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Похищение солнц? Друкари способны и не на такое, мон-кай — Комморра купается в лучах трех светил, украденных моими сородичами. Но если ты думаешь, что я приложил руку к этому, или иному воровству звезд — напрасно".

languages.text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."
languages.original_text: "Похищение солнц? {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g} способны и не на такое, мон-кай — Комморра купается в лучах трех светил, украденных моими сородичами. Но если ты думаешь, что я приложил руку к этому, или иному воровству звезд — напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Stealing the suns? The Drukhari are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think that I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

"Stealing the suns? The Drukhari are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think that I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

"Stealing the suns? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

"Stealing the suns? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

"Stealing the suns? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

languages.text: «¿Robar el sol? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} somos capaces de eso y de mucho más, mon-keigh. Commorragh se baña en la luz de tres estrellas robadas por mi pueblo. Pero si crees que yo he tenido algo que ver en este robo de soles o en cualquier otro, te equivocas».
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: «¿Robar el sol? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} somos capaces de eso y de mucho más, mon-keigh. Commorragh se baña en la luz de tres estrellas robadas por mi pueblo. Pero si crees que yo he tenido algo que ver en este robo de soles o en cualquier otro, te equivocas».

languages.text: “盗取群星？{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}确实有能力做到这点，而且不仅如此，猴子。我的族人盗走了三颗恒星，如今科摩罗沐浴在它们的光芒之下。不过，如果你以为我参与了这些行动或是盗取了其他恒星，那你可搞错了。”
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: “盗取群星？{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}确实有能力做到这点，而且不仅如此，猴子。我的族人盗走了三颗恒星，如今科摩罗沐浴在它们的光芒之下。不过，如果你以为我参与了这些行动或是盗取了其他恒星，那你可搞错了。”

languages.text: 「太陽を奪う？{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}ができることはそれだけではないぞ、モン＝ケイよ。コモラフは我が同胞が盗んだ3つの星の光を浴びているが、俺がそれやその他の太陽の略奪に関与していると思っているのなら…間違いだ」
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: 「太陽を奪う？{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}ができることはそれだけではないぞ、モン＝ケイよ――コモラフは我が同胞が盗んだ3つの星の光を浴びているが、俺がそれやその他の太陽の略奪に関与していると思っているのなら…間違いだ」

languages.text: "Diebstahl der Sonne? Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} sind dazu durchaus fähig – und zu noch viel mehr, Chem-Pan-Sey. Commorragh badet im Licht von drei Sternen, die die Meinen gestohlen haben. Aber falls Ihr glaubt, ich hätte etwas mit diesem oder einem anderen Diebstahl von Sonnen zu tun – dann irrt Ihr Euch."
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: "Diebstahl der Sonnen? Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} sind dazu durchaus fähig – und zu noch viel mehr, Chem-Pan-Sey. Commorragh badet im Licht von drei Sternen, die die Meinen gestohlen haben. Aber falls Ihr glaubt, ich hätte etwas mit diesem oder einem anderen Diebstahl von Sonnen zu tun – dann irrt Ihr Euch."

"Diebstahl der Sonnen? Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} sind dazu durchaus fähig – und zu noch viel mehr, Chem-Pan-Sey. Commorragh badet im Licht von drei Sternen, die die Meinen gestohlen haben. Aber falls Ihr glaubt, ich hätte etwas mit diesem oder einem anderen Diebstahl von Sonnen zu tun – dann irrt Ihr Euch."

languages.original_text: "Stealing the suns? The Drukhari are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

languages.text: « Voler le soleil ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} en sont plus que capables, mon-keigh. Commorragh baigne dans la lumière de trois étoiles dérobées par mon peuple. Cependant, si vous croyez que j'ai participé à ce vol ou à celui d'autres soleils, vous faites erreur. »
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: « Voler le soleil ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} en sont plus que capables, mon-keigh. Commorragh baigne dans la lumière de trois étoiles dérobées par mon peuple. Cependant, si vous croyez que j'ai participé à ce vol ou à celui d'autres soleils, vous faites erreur. »

languages.text: "Güneşi mi? {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, onu ve çok daha fazlasını yapmaya kadirdir mon-keigh. Commorragh, soydaşlarımın ele geçirdiği üç güneşin ışığıyla ısınıyor. Ancak bu meselede veya başka güneşlerin çalınmasında parmağım olduğunu düşünüyorsan yanılıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Stealing the sun? The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are capable of that and much more, mon-keigh — Commorragh bathes in the light of three stars stolen by my kin. But if you think I had a hand in this or any other theft of suns — you are mistaken."

traits.locale_text: "Güneşleri mi? {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} bunu ve daha çok şeyi yapabilme kabiliyetine sahiptir mon-keigh. Commorragh, soydaşlarımın ele geçirdiği üç güneşin ışığında mevcudiyetini sürdürüyor. Ancak bu meselede veya başka güneşlerin çalınmasında bir parmağım olduğunu düşünüyorsan yanılıyorsun."
